description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 20/02942/FUL. Amendment to wording of condition 93 (provision of a community centre and any associated indoor sport facilities).
decision_conditions: Condition 93 which reads: The details for the provision of the community centre and any associated indoor sport facilities shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority after consultation with Sport England prior to commencement of Block C in Phase 1. The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out other than in accordance with the approved details. Reason:  To ensure the satisfactory quantity, quality and accessibility of compensatory provision which secures a continuity of use and to accord with Development Plan Policy DM24 (Protection and Provision of Community Facilities) of Kingston Council's Core Strategy April 2012 and Policy S5 (Sports and recreation facilities) of the London Plan 2021.Is replaced with: The details for the provision of the community centre and any associated indoor sports facilities shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority after consultation with Sport England and prior to laying of the damp proof course in the external brickwork for Block C, Phase 1. The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out other than in accordance with the approved details.Reason: To ensure the satisfactory quantity, quality and accessibility of compensatory provision which secures a continuity of use and to accord with Development Plan Policy DM24 (Protection and Provision of Community Facilities) of Kingston Council's Core Strategy April 2012 and Policy S5 (Sports and recreation facilities) of the London Plan 2021.
